C

com.ferruml.exceptions - package com.ferruml.exceptions
This package contains custom exception classes
com.ferruml.formatter.wmic - package com.ferruml.formatter.wmic
This package contains classes that capture the output provided by WMI classes and handle some potential exceptions that may occur during parsing of the output
com.ferruml.system.currentuser - package com.ferruml.system.currentuser
This package contains classes that help fetch information related to the User currently logged in to the system
com.ferruml.system.hardware - package com.ferruml.system.hardware
This package contains classes that help fetch Hardware Information
com.ferruml.system.operatingsystem - package com.ferruml.system.operatingsystem
This package contains classes that help fetch OS and Time Zone information

G

get(String, String) - Static method in class com.ferruml.formatter.wmic.WMIC
Internally runs the command "wmic path WMIC_Class get WMIC_Attributes /format:list" where the parameters are provided by the calling methods
getAdapterID() - Static method in class com.ferruml.system.hardware.Win32_NetworkAdapter
Fetches a list of DeviceIDs of the Network Adapters that are active
getBaseboardPortID() - Static method in class com.ferruml.system.hardware.Win32_PortConnector
Gathers a list of port IDs based on their Tag property
getBaseboardPorts(String) - Static method in class com.ferruml.system.hardware.Win32_PortConnector
Gathers the port details based on the given port ID
getCacheID() - Static method in class com.ferruml.system.hardware.Win32_CacheMemory
This method returns the Cache Memory IDs of all the CPUs installed in the system
getCPUCache(String) - Static method in class com.ferruml.system.hardware.Win32_CacheMemory
This method returns the Cache Memory details of a CPU
getCurrentAudioDevice(String) - Static method in class com.ferruml.system.hardware.Win32_SoundDevice
This method fetches the Audio Device Driver details based on the Audio Device Captions
getCurrentPrinter(String) - Static method in class com.ferruml.system.hardware.Win32_Printer
This method returns Printer properties of the deviceID fetched to it
getCurrentProcessor(String) - Static method in class com.ferruml.system.hardware.Win32_Processor
This method fetches the CPU properties based on the given CPU ID
getDeviceIDList() - Static method in class com.ferruml.system.hardware.Win32_Printer
This method fetches a list of printer deviceIDs
getDirectory() - Static method in class com.ferruml.system.currentuser.User
Fetches the current working directory.
getDrive(String) - Static method in class com.ferruml.system.hardware.Win32_DiskDrive
Fetches the Disk Details whose IDs were fetched using the Win32_DiskDrive.getDriveID() method
getDriveID() - Static method in class com.ferruml.system.hardware.Win32_DiskDrive
Fetches a list of Disk Drives based on their Caption property [see the warning below].
getGPU(String) - Static method in class com.ferruml.system.hardware.Win32_VideoController
This method fetches a list of GPUs found in the system, based on their IDs
getGPUID() - Static method in class com.ferruml.system.hardware.Win32_VideoController
This method fetches a list of GPU IDs found in the system
getHardwareID() - Static method in class com.ferruml.system.hardware.HWID
Uses ExecutorService to spawn four threads with each thread calling the WMIC.get(String, String) directly or through the Win32 Classes to get specific parts of HWID which is then ultimately combined to form the final ID
getHome() - Static method in class com.ferruml.system.currentuser.User
Fetches the User directory in the form: "C:/Users/User-Name
getID(String, String) - Static method in class com.ferruml.formatter.wmic.WMIC
Internally runs the command "wmic path win32Class get Key / format:list" where the parameters are provided by the calling methods
getIDWhere(String, String, String, String) - Static method in class com.ferruml.formatter.wmic.WMIC
Internally runs the command "wmic path Win32_Class where determinantProperty = determinantValue get extractProperty /format:list" where the parameters are provided by the calling methods
getMemory(String) - Static method in class com.ferruml.system.hardware.Win32_PhysicalMemory
Fetches the properties mentioned in the class description based on the current memory stick Tag passed onto it
getMotherboard() - Static method in class com.ferruml.system.hardware.Win32_Baseboard
This method calls the WMIC.get(String, String) function and passes the WMI Class name and the properties whose values we want to fetch, as parameters
getNetworkAdapters(String) - Static method in class com.ferruml.system.hardware.Win32_NetworkAdapter
Fetches the properties mentioned in the class description based on the DeviceID of the adapter passed onto it
getOSInfo(String) - Static method in class com.ferruml.system.operatingsystem.Win32_OperatingSystem
Fetches a OS properties for a particular OS
getOSList() - Static method in class com.ferruml.system.operatingsystem.Win32_OperatingSystem
Fetches a list of OS Names installed in the System.
getOSTimeZone() - Static method in class com.ferruml.system.operatingsystem.Win32_TimeZone
Retrieves the OS Time-zone
getPrimaryBIOS() - Static method in class com.ferruml.system.hardware.Win32_BIOS
Fetches Primary BIOS Information (If your motherboard has multiple BIOSes, the Main BIOS information will always be fetched).
getProcessorList() - Static method in class com.ferruml.system.hardware.Win32_Processor
This method fetches a list of CPUs present in the system based on their IDs
getSoundDeviceID() - Static method in class com.ferruml.system.hardware.Win32_SoundDevice
This method fetches a list of Audio Device Captions found in the system
getTag() - Static method in class com.ferruml.system.hardware.Win32_PhysicalMemory
Fetches a list of DeviceIDs of the memory sticks that are currently installed based on their Tag property
getUsername() - Static method in class com.ferruml.system.currentuser.User
Fetches the user-name of the account currently logged in
getWhere(String, String, String, String) - Static method in class com.ferruml.formatter.wmic.WMIC
Internally runs the command "wmic path WMIC_Class where determinantProperty = determinantValue get WMIC_Attributes /format:list" where the parameters are provided by the calling methods

H

HWID - Class in com.ferruml.system.hardware
Hardware ID generation class based on the following format : "CPUName/CPUID/MotherboardName/DriveIDs"

S

ShellException - Exception Class in com.ferruml.exceptions
This is a custom exception class that is thrown when there are errors from command prompt's output
ShellException(String) - Constructor for exception class com.ferruml.exceptions.ShellException
Constructor for ShellException

U

User - Class in com.ferruml.system.currentuser
Retrieves the User Information of the Account logged in to the system

W

Win32_Baseboard - Class in com.ferruml.system.hardware
This class contains methods that query Win32_Baseboard and Win32_MotherboardDevice classes of WMI to fetch Motherboard information.
Win32_BIOS - Class in com.ferruml.system.hardware
This class contains methods that query the Win32_BIOS class of WMI and fetch BIOS information.
Win32_CacheMemory - Class in com.ferruml.system.hardware
This class contains methods that query the Win32_CacheMemory class of WMI to fetch CPU Cache information.
Win32_DiskDrive - Class in com.ferruml.system.hardware
This class contains methods that query Win32_DiskDrive class of WMI to fetch Disk Information.
Win32_NetworkAdapter - Class in com.ferruml.system.hardware
This class contains methods that query the Win32_NetworkAdapter class of WMI to fetch the Network Adapters that a installed and active.
Win32_OperatingSystem - Class in com.ferruml.system.operatingsystem
This class queries the Win32_OperatingSystem class of WMI and fetches the current OS details.
Win32_PhysicalMemory - Class in com.ferruml.system.hardware
This class contains methods that query the Win32_PhysicalMemory class of WMI to fetch RAM info.
Win32_PortConnector - Class in com.ferruml.system.hardware
This class queries the Win32_PortConnector class of WMI and represents the I/O Ports of your system's motherboard.
Win32_Printer - Class in com.ferruml.system.hardware
This class queries the Win32_Printer class of WMI and represents the installed printers in your device.
Win32_Processor - Class in com.ferruml.system.hardware
This class queries the Win32_Processor class of WMI and represents the CPU details of your system.
Win32_SoundDevice - Class in com.ferruml.system.hardware
This class queries the Win32_SoundDevice class of WMI and represents the Audio Driver details of your system.
Win32_TimeZone - Class in com.ferruml.system.operatingsystem
Fetches the OS Time-Zone information by querying WIn32_TimeZone class of WMI.
Win32_VideoController - Class in com.ferruml.system.hardware
This class queries the Win32_VideoController class of WMI and represents the basic GPU details of your system.
WMIC - Class in com.ferruml.formatter.wmic
This class queries all the WMI Classes based on the attributes passed to it's one of the four methods called by the methods in other packages.
